title: Obama, Newsom criticize Trump's EPA repeal
shortDescription: Former President Barack Obama and Governor Gavin Newsom criticized President Donald Trump's sweeping EPA repeal.

title: Trump tells troops at Fort Bragg Democrats would change the base's name
shortDescription: Trump told troops at Fort Bragg they should vote for Republicans because Democrats would change the base's name. He also joked about retiring there.

title: Trump on FBI role in Guthrie case
shortDescription: President Donald Trump commented on the FBI's involvement in the Nancy Guthrie case, saying local authorities are still in charge.

title: House Republicans Rebuke Trump on Canada Tariffs
shortDescription: The House rejected President Trump’s tariffs on Canada in a 219–211 vote, marking a rare bipartisan rebuke of his signature trade policy.

title: Trump's National Guard deployment isn't over in these 3 cities
shortDescription: While National Guard troops have quietly left Los Angeles, Chicago and Portland, Oregon, thousands remain in three other U.S. cities.

title: Georgia bill adds additional restrictions to gender-affirming care
shortDescription: Amendments added to a home health bill in Georgia ban puberty blockers and add restrictions to gender-affirming care in the state.

title: Daily Briefing: Democrats on thin ice
shortDescription: Dems strategy risks a DHS shutdown — but ICE won't close. Here is the news to know on Friday.

title: Trump's Freedom250 faces scrutiny over transparency, donor access
shortDescription: Some are raising concerns that Freedom 250, the group President Donald Trump created to support his 250th plans, skirts federal rules.

title: Funding bill stalls, putting DHS at risk
shortDescription: The U.S. is on the verge of another government shutdown. This time, only the Department of Homeland Security is at risk.

title: Obama says US 'less safe' after Trump repeals landmark climate finding
shortDescription: Barack Obama said the U.S. is "less safe" after President Donald Trump repealed the legal basis for federal regulations targeting climate change.

title: Why them? Civil rights groups question Trump snub of Black, gay govs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has rumbled with many state Democrats, but he is only excluding a Black governor and a gay one from a White House meeting.

title: What is the SAVE Act? Voter ID law passes House
shortDescription: The legislation would require people provide proof of citizenship when registering to vote in federal elections. Here's what that could look like.
